balanceOf(address).notice: Current vault balance for an asset (token decimals).

deposit(address,address,uint256).notice: Deposit an asset into the vault (PSM or user path).

isAssetSupported(address).notice: Whether an asset is supported by the vault.

withdraw(address,address,uint256,bytes32.notice: Withdraw an asset from the vault (PSM redeem or treasury sweep).
